about_the_game:
We need you, Pilot!


Do you love Exoblast?
Here's one way to support the game: grab the "Unicorn Skins" pack and allow the development team to continue developing the game!
Every support pack comes with exclusive skins and announcer!

Exoblast is 100% free!


We wanted to make a fun and eye-catching first game.
But above all, we wanted to bring together a large community of passionate players.
Exoblast needs players and for that what better than a free game?

Do you like the game and want to thank the development team, help us, keep Exoblast servers online?
Whatever your reason, you are there to support us and we thank you very much!



This pack will give you fairy skins, so you can sparkle with glitters and rainbows while you slain your enemies.
Enjoy the joy of your announcer to win with grace!

We are counting on you, Pilot!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel Core I5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core I5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

name: Exoblast - Unicorn Skins

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core I5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Support us and get an exclusive fairy skin and announcer pack to become the cutest Pilot ever! Your help will allow us to keep Exoblast alive and to continue its development!
